data.text: @ChorltonHoney Thanks, found out the ££ way that I needed to change how I was doing it. Fortunately not a breeder queen

@ormejp Hi
The queen is in a 'Butler' style transport cage having just been removed from a mating nuc. I spray the transport cage with water so as to wet the queen - open the transport cage and she will walk onto the frame of brood then cage goes on top. The water stops her flying off!

@adamtalbot Hi Adam
If only we had the time. All our honey goes to the Barbakan- when we eventually get round to getting it into jars; the Barbakan are very patient!
@ChorltonHoney How do you reliably get the queen into the press in cage?
